meanings.sent1: I always separate my washables from my dry-clean-only clothes.
meanings.sent2: She put the delicate washables in a mesh laundry bag.
meanings.sent3: The sock puppet show featured a cast of colorful washables.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a load of washables, refreshing and bright.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh washables filled the room, comforting and clean.

meanings.sent1: I do the washables on Saturdays to have clean clothes for the week.
meanings.sent2: His job at the laundromat involves handling all the washables.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power was the ability to control all washables with a wave of his hand.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the washing machine was a soothing lullaby of washables in motion.
meanings.sent5: The rhythm of washing the washables became a calming routine in her busy life.
